im too deep to quit and too strict to fold and you need to split nigga g into code come on cause this years to teach homey speak to know it body bout what we talk about you weak youre row the game is overcrowded so we fight for space neighbourhood show the hustle still we grind to win tryin to find a way to come up on 2 pounds of yay and double up it aint never happened touch it a lot of niggas focued on their candy paints diamonds in the grills steering wheels and grains but i aint trippin out here flippin i just need to think money miny on a mission tryin to steal me bank rlidin in homicides we get it fuck it peepin in horn killin all these pussy niggas think theyre keepin in god pistol cocked on the block and all im fearin is death but then again nigga roaddog you feelin me yet so if i died im tryin to get it mamma merely deed and pray to god that he kept this spot in hell for me sad as fuck but it makes me stuck down the row bust friends back in the prison foundin rock to the truck here i smoke and tryin to hide it but was played by the rule and if live like the dope fiend then you can do what they do im on my own in this whole dog world all alone in the ghetto deep in weed sweat in jelly nose worrey eyes you either do it or you die crimin in flood ridin in blood cause this is your life
willie d: i just got word; my uncle done died but aint no tears on my face cause i done already cried i been here before dead to me is nothin new my hearts heavy mamma gone popps too i tried my best to get my purpose to the lord but sometimes this shit be fuckin with me hard and im heartless im a kid again lookin out my window watchin niggas get murdered in college worked the parties stomack growlin drinkin water just to get through the night goin to school on an empty stomach gettin the fights cause sure there were fights and i was bustin like the sun bitch the smallest nigga on the block lettin the guns click im convicted before eleven walkin through unto the tails searchin for heaven and livin in hell they say im wrong for teach this on fuck what you believe cant heal by myself thats the way im livin this is my life
bushwick bill: i only got one eye but i see things ever so clear bein acquainted with debts but i never known fear i still roll to spots cats scared to go then if its a heaven for a g if not prepare to go then id live for today and not promise tommorrow smoke weed and sip lee and try to dry my sorrows in this game of life aint no rules to follow and infact imma liver for them; its a hard heal to swallow im still the smallest cat with the biggest rep in h-town stress in my life is gettin hard to take down havin visions of cats goin to rip in my wake now it feels like im about to have a nervous break down it takes a big man to share this pride tryin to get my soul right and put the bread inside yall niggas just too scared to ride they got it from still i alive though why i feel so dead inside this is my life....
